definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_disable_damage"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">7200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/tellraw @p ["",{"text":"Invincibility Activated","color":"white"},{"text":"\n"},{"text":"Cooldown: 6 Minutes","color":"red"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">ADVENTURE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
